website_summaries.verdict: Seven layers of all-weather protection make this a standout choice.
pros: Get quality and protection with this Oxford cover
Three polypropylene layers keep water out while maintaining breathability
cons: The cover may begin to crack after a year of constant use

customer_reviews.title: Pay a little extra for quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality far superior to that junk in the retail stores. Waterproof. Soft underside won't scratch paint*. Perfect fit for my 2014 Nissan Altima S. * ONLY put your cover on immediately after washing/drying your car, otherwise the grit will get trapped between the cover and paint, and covering the car in that condition will actually scratch it worse than no cover at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tom D

customer_reviews.title: it is more like a universal car cover and it is so big ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cover for my son's car according to the ordering for a particular car and model. We'll, it is more like a universal car cover and it is so big that didn't fit his convertible camero right at all. We have to use lots of bungee cords to keep it from flying away because it's so big.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: Best cover I've ever owned... Its 100% water proof. Puddles of water don't seep through. It withstood a week of monsoon rains, and hence my car was dry as a bone underneath. Pliable, light, breathable, safe on all types of paint... and it has an elastic drawstring to keep it tight so it won't fly away in a wind storm. What more could you ask for. I've paid twice the price for garbage covers that trapped dirt and soot in them, were heavy and didn't protect against weather worth a &$^#. Great cover 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s been great
customer_reviews.text: It’s been great . It is truly waterproof ! It’s been on my 1970 ragtop Dodge Challenger for 6 months. We live in the northeast so this cover sees rain,sleet ,snow and sun ! The water still beads up even in the wettest weather. My car is not mint just a seasonal fun driver but I still wanted to protect it . I’m not sure how it would do on a car with perfect paint finish ... those belong in a garage anyway
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for a California 2009 Mustang GT
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cover...fits my 2009 Mustang GT...with raised hood scoop...repels rain and the dark gray color works well. Would recommend putting a couple of bungie cords through the hole eyelets located on driver and passenger doors, through the under neath the car on windy days. Seems to do the job just fine. Folds up well with minimal effort to store in the car trunk. Would recommend this cover. Good price, great cover !
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: GREAT, high-quality product - this did everything we needed it to
customer_reviews.text: We used it to cover our classic '72 CONVERTIBLE 442 OLDS while outside in a very dusty and extremely windy area. We didn't even put the top up! We could not believe how well it worked. It is heavy, but breathable and protected it from the wind, the rain, and the dust! It never even got close to blowing off! We lost another brand that way and are so pleased with this brand and so very glad we bought it. It was well worth the money in our opinion! Like the name says 'storm-proof' and it definitely is!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful quality product. Super heavy material. Very impressed with build quality. Seams vulcanized. Well worth the money. Very happy and will buy again. Update....bought a 2nd for a diff car. Great cover. Check Amazon for the sizing....I won't know what will fit your car.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy A. Germiller

customer_reviews.title: Super heavy-duty
customer_reviews.text: This cover is super heavy-duty! It is absolutely nothing like a lightweight tarp, which is great. I love that the underside is soft, so it doesn't scratch my paint. The exterior is thick and the entire cover is completely weather-proof. The ring holes are super convenient for tying it down so it doesn't flap around. All of the stitching is done well and the cover is really well-made! I also like that it comes with a drawstring bag to store it in when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. We bought this to cover up our 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We bought this to cover up our 3 year old Challenger for the winter (yea I wanted to drive it all winter, but the husband said no! he doesn't want the underside to get rusty). It is heavy material, easy to put on and secure and so far has been lasting perfectly with several winter storms and ice. Will update in the spring if it does not hold up as well as it appears to :)
customer_reviews.author: Debi Pride

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the positive feedback on this car cover, I'm thinking we must have been shipped a defective one or a different, inferior model. The biggest problem with this car cover is, the car becomes filthy after a rain. We had our first serious rain since I purchased the cover. After the rain, I removed the cover and found the car streaked with ribbons of dirt. See uploaded picture. The second problem is we trusted the vendor's sizing recommendation and not our own measurements. The result is a car cover that is too large. I'm hoping the vendor will contact me to make this right and I am able to give a positive review.
customer_reviews.author: Doug in LA

customer_reviews.title: ... that the cover cracked leaks (see photo) and is useless. After numerous attempts to contact the supplier (picturesque ...
customer_reviews.text: Paid premium price for multi layer protection and 1 year warranty only to learn after 6 months that the cover cracked leaks (see photo) and is useless. After numerous attempts to contact the supplier (picturesque something) they finally responded that there was no warranty claim. Tried to contact the manufacturer, OxGord, but to no avail. In my opinion this supplier has not been honest in sale nor warranty, beware, beware, beware.
customer_reviews.author: library lady

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Garbage.... didn't make it thru the winter. No longer water proof. Not recommended for vehicles of value, perhaps good to cover manure...
customer_reviews.author: Shelby3825

customer_reviews.title: Fits very well and is waterproof and soft on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits very well and is waterproof and soft on the inside. I am unsure how much the car car breath under it and have not had it long enough to see how it holds up with the sun. For the money it seems to be good Just upgraded to five Stars very please car breathes well.
customer_reviews.author: shaun

customer_reviews.title: I got it on Dec 27, 2017 it’s may ...
customer_reviews.text: I got it on Dec 27, 2017 it’s may 12. 2018 not even 5 months and it’s leaking on hood. I have a 1968 chevelle i only remover it 4 times to move car. And now it leaks I live in So Cal
customer_reviews.author: alan

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Cover didn’t last a season. Let lots of water through onto the car and then once it was there it kept it there and didn’t let it vent/evaporate. I should’ve checked it sooner to validate it was working but I didn’t. Useless other than keeping debris off the car. NOT waterproof
customer_reviews.author: seanie sedan

customer_reviews.title: Good heavy duty coveer
customer_reviews.text: The cover seems to be very heavy duty. When you get confirmation check that it is the size you ordered. I just checked that I had a confirmation and got a 216" cover instead of the 168" I needed. I don't know if it was a filling error or if I made the error when ordering. They did exchange it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Berens

customer_reviews.title: Save your money...
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend. Buy several of the cheap ones at Walmart (Budge) and change them out often. Better coverage and value!
customer_reviews.author: D. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Buy it. It's worth it. Took an ice storm and a broken bungie to finally take it out
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 2 so far. The first lasted 5 years in new england. That says a lot. Winters arent easy here. A couple major ice storms finally ripped a hole in it when it ended up partially frozen to the ground and 50mph winds were happening. Anyways I'm happy with it so I bought it again. Just be sure to measure you car and use a couple bungie cords to secure the sides to each other. Put them under the car, 1 behind the front tires and another in front of the rear.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Put it on your card before the weather hits.
customer_reviews.text: Well, my bad. I should have measure but it said “WILL FIT YOUR 2004 MUSTANG”. Nope. And somewhere does it say only three grommets? Who puts on three grommets? Why not four? So the thing is pulled way back with bricks underneath the car holding down the back since there is nothing there to tighten it down. Wyoming is infamous for its constant wind and crappy winters which, surprisingly enough the reason I bought it. It’s there for the winter regardless of my annoyance. Snow is expected tomorrow so I don’t have time to send it back. I’ll make do. I’m not thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Brendon Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Measure your car first.
customer_reviews.text: Had my car painted so I didn’t even open the package for over a month. It is a great product but it does not fit my Mustang. It is a little too small. In all fairness, I did not contact the seller because I had it for over a month before I even tried to put it on, again, due to the recent paint job. Advised not to cover it for four weeks. The site said it would fit. Maybe without the rear spoiler....
customer_reviews.author: RODMom14

customer_reviews.title: Only good for a garage
customer_reviews.text: It says it’s storm proof.... I guess it might be if it had a way to keep it on the car. There is one tiny string with grommets that goes UNDER the MIDDLE of the vehicle. A real pain! That’s it. Nothing at either end. Not even any grommets so you could add something. Every time the wind blows the cover blows off. It would be fine in a closed garage but awful for outside. And, when the cover blows off the string in the middle keeps it from blowing away. It stays and flaps in the wind possibly damaging your paint. We bought it for a vintage 1968 Buick Skylark. I cannot recommend staying away from this cover enough.
customer_reviews.author: qckslvr

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE! THESE COVERS WILL DAMAGE YOUR VEHICLE!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE- If you have also experienced damage to your vehicles from these car covers, send a message to carcoverdamage@gmail.com We purchased multiple covers from this company, Won Lane, which damaged our cars. No help from Amazon! You will be stuck, just like us. These covers, due to their chemical makeup, will damage plastic components, especially headlights. We have literally thousands of dollars in damage and neither Won Lane or Amazon will do anything to help. Do not buy anything from this company or covers similar to this!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Rached

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: This cover caused permanent damage to the original paint on both the hood and trunk. We used it for about 3-4 months. Upon removal we discovered damage that looks like a chemical reaction of some sort has occurred. The original paint job is ruined on the trunk and the hood where the cover was in contact with car. There are dusty rust looking water marks and they are not washable or removable. Looks like a new paint job is the only way to conceal it.
customer_reviews.author: Keitha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Car Cover
customer_reviews.text: I have a sports car with an aftermarket wing which makes it difficult when it comes to a car cover. Actually bought two of these I was so happy with it! Covers car perfectly including the wing. Love the soft inside of it so no worries with scratching. Exterior is waterproof but car is garaged so that is not really needed. Cover is pliable and it is easy to put on and remove from the car. I also love that no dust or lint is left on the car from the cover. Can wash the car and cover it up without any worries of the cover affecting the clean finish. Thanks for the great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca McKelvey

customer_reviews.title: Cover is cracking
customer_reviews.text: Covered my sons audi over the summer. When I uncovered the car after a few months the car was covered in dust and the cover is cracking very unhappy with this product. I feel I wasted my money. Foe The money I paid I could have just bought a good tarp.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Keeps out rain, sun, and pollen.
customer_reviews.text: The extra large fits my 2012 Chevy Impala 4-door with a few inches to spare. Goes on easily and keeps out the rain very well. Looked under it after a drenching Florida rain and all was dry. Sun dried the cover quickly. I am happy with the performance. The car has to sit outside. I got the cover with the suggested bungee cords and clips. A heavy wind before the rain made me glad I did as that held the cover tightly. I also got the cable and lock to keep the cover from being easily stolen. And a game camera for backup.
customer_reviews.author: Gatorman76

customer_reviews.title: Beware, this car rain cover is not worth the price, Go buy a big tarp instead
customer_reviews.text: this is not what I expected. the information says 7 layers, of what., this item is more like a dust collector. It was too small to cover my little Chev Malibu Lt. . Very Poor quality, like a big cheap tarp. was going to return it, but my husband had marked ti indicate front and back. Don’t recommend this item unless you are looking for a bad dust cover that does not fit your car. Also this cover was not worth what I paid. Got jipped!
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste your time or money on this cover
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cover in March 2019.Had cover 3 months,took cover off car on June 29,2019. At this point water has gotten through the cover and water gotten on the car. Got in touch with both the manufacturer and seller.They would not stand behind this product and replace or refund. DON'T BUY...BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: bker62

customer_reviews.title: Quality car cover
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly a perfect fit (would be nice if had pockets for the mirrors) but it is designed to fit multiple applications not my specific vehicle. Covers everything to the ground and has held up longer than any other car cover I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S

customer_reviews.title: One major headache
customer_reviews.text: The cover works just fine for protection except the fuzzy inside will collect leaves, dirt or anything it touches. It's difficult to clean off. Since I keep my car outside and there are trees (with plenty of falling leaves) I either need to be extremely careful removing the cover or just not use it. I chose the later.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wester

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money but still not great quality
customer_reviews.text: I like this cover. Good quality for the money. Problem I have is the lining is very loose material and left a mess on my fabric convertible top when I removed it. Looked like a heard of cats slept on my roof. Took me two hours to clean all the lint off
customer_reviews.author: harry archond

customer_reviews.title: Good quality item
customer_reviews.text: Good quality item, brought this for a 2014 Honda Accord, it was a little large but that was OK for me. Remember to purchase some bungee cords that will connect to clips to secure the cover to the cover in the wind. First day, wind blow the cover right off.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome

customer_reviews.title: Do not use in direct sun will crack within two months
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this in July it is now the end of September. I live in South Texas as used to cover a car outside in full sun. The sun has already deteriorated the plastic it is discolored and cracking. This is not a good choice for anything that is going to be in direct sun...... FOLLOW UP.. 11/19 DO NOT PUT THIS ON YOUR CAR OUTDOORS in the weather it will stain and ruin the finish on your paint. BEWARE!!!! I have 2 and both car finishes were damaged so not an isolated incident!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles P.

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2015 Prius C; it fits, but is VERY large. My parking spot is beneath a tree, and I noticed that it was getting extremely dirty from pollen since I wasn't driving much during quarantine. With no real option of another parking spot, I bought this to help keep it a little cleaner between washings and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Kae Winters

customer_reviews.title: almost great
customer_reviews.text: About 6 inches too short for our 2005 Honda Civic. Manufacturer did not put grommet for the back of the car, making it difficult to secure the cover in the windy conditions we live in.
customer_reviews.author: gary gruber

customer_reviews.title: It’s great cover but...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great cover but the string that was included on the cover did not held the cover down when windy. The cover flew up half way. I am returning to get a refund. Also, if you are planning to buy this cover/tarp, make sure you buy real cable to hold it down or buy a cover that includes the real wire cable.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Overall good.
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is a good product, I have a 2019 Dodge Charger R/T, and the only reason I didnt give it a 5 star is cause it doesnt cover my entire car. Covers 3/4 of it, and gets the important parts covered, but there is part of the lower bumper on either side I pull it on exposed. As stated, not enough to be like OMG it doesn't work, but enough to take 1 star away. If you have a bigger vehicle like mine, I'd advise getting the biggest option available. Overall it does what it suppose to do and works.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cover a 1985 Trans Am. It didn't come with instructions. I guess I should be smart enough to figure it out, but it had 3 hole for the 2 sides and the front. I tried to make it work but it wasn't tight enough to keep the wind from blowing it off. I ended up taking it off and parking my vehicle in the garage and leaving my daily car in the weather. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: Ken W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this car cover for our 2005 Mercury Grand Marquis LS because we live in a rural area and it gets really dusty when the farmers are working the nearby fields. This cover is a perfect fit. The cover is well made and if good quality, and the price was better for our budget. We are very happy with it. We highly recommend this cover and this company. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: I. M. Adams

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE PRODUCT THAT IS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: I placed a buy again order for the OxGord car cover I purchased in August 21 2018. Since the car cover was high quality excellent car cover. The one delivered on April 26, 2019 is totally different. Cheap material, junk, Not a STORM COVER as advertised. For the same price. Buyer beware of buy again orders. This seller is Als Supply. The 2018 car cover that is an excellent deal from National Distributors. I am returning the junk car cover, as I hope it’s an error vs a bait and switch.
customer_reviews.author: nestor j javech

customer_reviews.title: Worse car I ever puchased not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Worse car I ever puchased not worth the money , put on my car and blows off every time we get any kind of wind..
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Durstoseph Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: this is really good product for the price, very strong and sturdy. I used it during hurricane Harvey in Houston and even though the waters didn't rise above the vehicle it rained for 3 days straight flooding all around us and when I uncovered the car it was as clean as when I covered it which I was very happy to see. I have a Cadillac Deville and it fit just right in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Valtierra

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Stitching.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the cover March 17, 2019. Twice I adjusted the cover on the car by hand and the seam stitching broke on both of the main seams running front to back. The cover material seams to be fine but the thread used to stitch the seams is faulty. It's coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bonnette

customer_reviews.title: Protects against the Florida rain and sun
customer_reviews.text: This is the first car cover that died and sealed my 67 Chevy Impala from the rain and heat beating Florida sun. I was hesitant to but the car cover because I have brought car covers for double the price but we had a thunderstorm system that was due to got us and I have a little window leak on my passenger side. I can say one thing and that is no water was seen on the floor for the first time in a long time.... It fits well and I just used the tire down rope that comes with the package and u am happy..... VERY HAPPY
customer_reviews.author: kidsan barnes

customer_reviews.title: Best Car Cover!
customer_reviews.text: This is a weighty, well-made, durable and high quality car cover that has been on my car in the Hot Sun, Snow and Wind, and is still in excellent condition, showing only a bit of wear at the side view mirror area. (I had bought a different cheaper cover a few months before I bought this won, which was a piece of trash that disintegrated and left white pilled material everywhere.). I highly recommend this OxGord cover and I will be buying only this cover for all of my cars in the future. It really stands up and is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: L. Willitts

customer_reviews.title: heavy weight, but watch the sizing
customer_reviews.text: Too big for my car, even though the chart indicated it would be perfect. I ended up putting a bungee cord around the extra material like a ponytail. The fabric is very heavy and looks like it will do a great job of keeping my car clean and the paint & finish protected as I live near the Pacific Ocean. If I hadn't marked the inside-front with red marker, I would return it for a smaller size. So I'll just make do.
customer_reviews.author: Hopey

customer_reviews.title: Fit and Form
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. An exact to a tee molded fit. Perfect form. Audible snap in place to assure its secure. Adjustable belt/holster angle to a comfort setting. I use this for my deep hiking trips and its surprisingly accommodating. A great personal buy for me.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: good product. looks solid
customer_reviews.text: I really like the material and workmanship but unfortunately i couldn't find the right size for my cal. XL was too small and CL was too large. So I ended up returning the covers i bought. If it fits your car, looks like a solid product for th eprice.
customer_reviews.author: M Gachi

customer_reviews.title: Car protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 2014 mustang and I read all the instructions and I had recently gotten a new pain job my my front bumbper and you can’t put it on cars that just got painted after 8 months so I give it to my dad he put it on this 2014 Toyota corolla and it rain all day and it ended up giving my dad car some big spots on the back that won’t come back and it’s hard to put on, I recommend you store your car in a garage instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than a storage unit
customer_reviews.text: Great car cover. Hubby bought one last fall for his old car and it worked so good at protecting the car from rain and snow that he bought another cover this year to get another car out of his shop. Now he can tackle the 1932 Pontiac this winter in a cleared shop!
customer_reviews.author: Monkeygirl

customer_reviews.title: no water gets past it and you have have the car covered for weeks outside and when you take off the cover the car still looks gr
customer_reviews.text: A must have if you need to park a car outside that you want protected. This is the real deal, no water gets past it and you have have the car covered for weeks outside and when you take off the cover the car still looks great! The cotton base is smooth and does not scratch your car.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Protects your car... It worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This car cover is awesome... Waterproof and heavy duty.... It protects my car from rain and hard weather conditions. I only give 4 stars because it comes in a bag of the same material but it got ripped 3 days after i bought it so I have to store it in my trunk.
customer_reviews.author: JOHAN CORREDOR

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY SO FAR
customer_reviews.text: GREAT BUY SO FAR, VERY DURABLE THE REAL TEST IS HOW WELL WILL IT HOLD UP DURING THE SO. CALIFORNIA SUMMER ALSO I WAS HOPING THAT IT WOULD BE A LITTLE LONGERI CAN SEE THAT IT DOES'NT FULLY COVER THE FRONT END OF MY 2004 LINCOLN TOWNCAR FRONT END
customer_reviews.author: Zina Boone

customer_reviews.title: First Class Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love these covers! Excellent service and Excellent quality! I needed them for my husband’s classic cars (1959 Ford Galaxie 500 & 1957 Chevrolet Belair) Both of his vehicles are quite rare and very valuable. These covers more than fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Tarebear 1957

customer_reviews.title: Works very good. I wish I had not thrown away the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very good. I wish I had not thrown away the box and paperwork from the last car cover I order. It was twice as much as this, and after the 1st rain, soooo easy to tear. Absolutely worthless. THIS COVER IS 1ST RATE. I'M VERY HAPPY
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Look around
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about 3 months. I had it secured as recommended per manufactures recommendation. After three months water was leaking through it and it ripped. I repaired the rip and two days later it was shredded.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing car cover. Only thing, I ordered the wrong size. It’s to big. Need to order one size smaller. Well, I stand corrected. The smaller size was to snug. Going to return the smaller one now. The 2XL covers the tires which helps with sun rotting.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Near Perfect fit for 1978 Cadillac Coupe DeVille!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality for the price. Can't beat the value, the cover was better than described with clear instructions in English and so easy to unfold and pull over the car. No reservations about the cover damaging the paint, the quality under the outside is gentle and the cover itself has a nice weight that will take unusually high winds to move. All the others I had of similar weight still flew off after some wind. This is great value for the price! If you own a classic Caddy, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Egh

customer_reviews.title: Great cover 👍!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cover for over six months now and it has been great. I have this cover on a 1973 Mercury Montego. It has protected it in sun, snow, rain, and high wind with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: D. Graf

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say it fits like a glove but it's plenty big enough for my 2005 Lincoln Town Car. It is definitely a lot thicker than the one I had b4. That 1 has numerous holes in it from the hood ornament. It doesn't seem to phase this 1 in the least. My husband says it's too big 4 my car bc he wants it 4 his truck! Lotsa luck bud. I definitely would recommend this cover & we maybe just might 4 the truck he-he-he.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN THEISS

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Very good heavy duty cover. Very unhappy with the fact that I bought one and they shipped no problem but when I went to order a second they won't ship to my location any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Latimer

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice for the Price - Durability is About a Year...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this relatively inexpensive cover- Keeps the car clean and dry. After about a year outside in Florida, it becomes stiff and needs to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: CoconutGrover

customer_reviews.title: Solid protective raincover
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a rainproof cover. Water beads right off of it so there may be some condensation underneath but otherwise a solid rain cover build for storms and with the included lock and cable, this cover will stay on. I got the recommended cover my size car but it is very big and covered my car well... just don't expect an exact fit since you're not paying $300-500 for a form-fitting cover.
customer_reviews.author: Hemedude

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit and Look
customer_reviews.text: The 2009 Dodge Challenger loves its new outfit that fits perfectly and looks as elegant as any automobile cover ever worn by this make and model. Like a quality sunscreen, this gray outfit covers the entire vehicle well to protect this magnificent muscle car all summer long in HOTLANTA.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this long but it seems to be good quality. I was surprised by the weight it has a nice heft to it. I like that it comes with a bag to store it when it's not being used.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Measure your vehicle!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the cover was good. A nice heavy cover. The fit and sizing information was terrible. Don’t go by the fit for your vehicle, measure your car. When I put my car info in it told me to order the CL cover which was way too large. I took measurements after I got the cover and found I needed a medium. Now I have to buy a second cover and the shipping cost to return the first one will be so high it isn’t worth sending back. Now I’ve paid $140 to get a $70 cover.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Nevs

customer_reviews.title: It has a soft under side which is good for the paint
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this car cover for my 1973 Jaguar XJ12. It is a little big but covers the car totally. We have had over 4" of rain in the last 7 days and the cover has repelled the water. It is a heavy cover and the wind has not blown it off. It has a soft under side which is good for the paint. All in all it is the best car cover I have purchased in the last 7 years.
customer_reviews.author: D. Burton

customer_reviews.title: Fits Nicely on my Classic 1972 Oldsmobile Cutlass S
customer_reviews.text: I like the nice fit on my very large A body GM Classic Car. I had bought a couple cheap covers from costco/Oreillys and they were poorly fit and cheaply made. This cover fit great. Although the string ties included were a bit undersized.. I repurposed some from another cover and it fits tight and I have no fear of it blowing off. 100% waterproof as it started raining the day I got it. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT P.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up if in direct sunlight
customer_reviews.text: The cover doesn’t really hold up to being direct sunlight. The cover became brittle and started to crack. Now it has duct tape securing some of the rips and tears.
customer_reviews.author: Neal M. Naydo

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect sizing warning
customer_reviews.text: Sizing was wrong. I bought the size recommend for my BMW Z3. It was so oversized it dragged on the ground on all sides! When I returned it they charged a 20% for a re-stocking charge.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Consider other cheaper options, dont try your luck with this one.
customer_reviews.text: Received the cover. Missing storage bag and antenna patch. Product was folded and tied with scrap fabric material and then in clear plastic bag. No leaflet no instructions. Just another car cover. No way whatsoever to verify if this is the product/ version/ model I purchased considering it is Not The Cheapest out there.. fingers crossed if its really "storm" or even waterproof. Fleece layer is ultra thin, doubted its gonna last for more than 3 months outdoor under the sun.
customer_reviews.author: jeffyiu

customer_reviews.title: Looser seller on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Crappy. Cover would not fit. Shipped it back and they received it 8 days ago. Texted company about refund and they needed ups tracking number. They didn’t even know that it was there. Gave them the tracking number and who received it and where it was left and at what time it was received. And now they will not respond to any of my emails or texts. This cost me 74 dollars. And they refuse to give me my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Romney Prince

customer_reviews.title: Not great, expected better.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 2001 BMW 330i convertible. It’s far too large, even though this is the size recommended for my car. What’s really annoying is the inside of the cover. Every time I take it off, it leaves behind long white fibers on the convertible top that are very hard to remove. I ended up using packing tape to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Coen

customer_reviews.title: Will not protect against hail.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice cover, however, be aware that it will not avoid hail damage to your car. I bought the seven layer cover thinking it would avoid hail damage, but it does not! A nice cover just to avoid the rain or sun exposure, but nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: WT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cover for my 2003 Monte Carlo
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover for a 2003 Monte Carlo. It is a well made heavy car cover and fits my car very well. I like that there are no side mirror pockets and since my car has no exterior antenna this helps for a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jim E.

customer_reviews.title: Great car cover
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2007 Mustang convertible that sits out in the weather. This is my second car cover and I am very pleased with my purchase. Great fit and keeps it bone dry.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S.

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for the 1969 Cadillac Coup de Ville!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a very long and wide cover. This fit the car perfectly. It seems sturdy enough for a good long time out in the elements. We had a set of high wind and hard rain days in the last week. I could not tell that it had moved at all. I did not even use the cord provided to secure the middle. Only fear that I had was the pointy tail fins, so I put a little padding on them to make sure they weren’t likely to poke through with winds. Very pleased so far!
customer_reviews.author: longhornlaura

customer_reviews.title: As advertized
customer_reviews.text: Cover came and was as advertised. It's very big but since it is a generic size I would rather have it on the larger size than too tight. Let's see if it lasts at least one year in the moderate CA weather. I have tried several other makers and only get a max of one year before they break down no matter what they "guarantee".
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I would of liked it to have more elastic at the ends so ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits well on my 2008 E350 Mercedez. I used a bungy chord to tie together the middle of the grommets. I would of liked it to have more elastic at the ends so as to tighten the cover around the car versus hanging flat, but the material was top line. It was the perfect size, and the price was right. M
customer_reviews.author: Advanced Medical - CPRx

customer_reviews.title: Save your money this will crack and fall apart
customer_reviews.text: Bought in March 2019. Didn’t even last a year. Fell apart, brittle outside crumbled and cracked and peeled. Now there are holes in it and water leaks inside. I thought by paying a little more I would be getting better quality but fell apart faster than $20 dollar ones here on amazon. Complete waste of money. I tried contacting seller and they instructed me to take pictures and after I sent pictures I never heard back from them ever since. Please save your money don’t buy this garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Bunnie

customer_reviews.title: Size does matter. 1965 Mustang Fastback
customer_reviews.text: I bought two covers for my 1965 Mustang Fastback. ..the large and the extra large. I bought extra large first and wasn’t happy about the extra length hanging down(sorry no pics of that..touched floor on both sides and hung with a lot of extra on each end). So I decided to try the “large” size. Those are the pics I added. I just wanted a cover for inside my garage. It is just a tad to small, but works for me and what I wanted. Absolutely love the quality and soft interior of the cover. Definitely is the kind of cover you want to protect your baby.
customer_reviews.author: B. Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but great service
customer_reviews.text: Just received and put on my car... was a little disappointed because I found a 3! Inch section that the sewer missed the double stitch. I contacted the seller and they took care of it right away!!!
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product - look at pictures
customer_reviews.text: This cover is junk. Bought it in April and by the middle of August the weather proofing is completely gone and the fabric is rotten. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hall

customer_reviews.title: Fits Old Land Yacts!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the CL up to 229" for a 62 Pontiac Bonneville. Its a bit long but fit the car well! Great quality. I will buy the 204" for the 62 Pontiac Catalina since it is 7" shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: It fits my SLK Mercedes perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts, I went ahead and ordered it, then Took me a month to get it on the car. It fits like a glove on my SLK Mercedes. I just had to cut a small hole for the antenna as per the instructions Great product
customer_reviews.author: flavio michel

customer_reviews.title: Not a 100% water proof !!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping took about a week and this thing is far from water proof.. I give it two stars being it is very heavy and nice quality.. But believe me it is far from a 100% water proof . My Corvette is soaking wet..
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover for my 2013 Audi A4. It said it would fit this vehicle, but it did not. The Audi A4 is 185 inches long. This cover is 168 inches. I squeezed on the car, but it does not fit correctly. I bought this some time ago (2019) and it is pretty much useless to me for this vehicle. Disappointing that the size information was misleading.
customer_reviews.author: William M. Puddister

customer_reviews.title: Quick turn around time for when the cover was bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Quick turn around time for when the cover was bought. During a drastic 35 mile an hour winds, the heavy, thick material stayed in place but had to have rope tied around the bottom to keep the whipping winds from blowing off the cover. Over all very impressed with the product.
customer_reviews.author: J Deane

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t go past bumpers Ford Flex
customer_reviews.text: Great fabric, but too bad it doesn’t fit all the way past the bumpers , the wind will easily blow this off
customer_reviews.author: Joe Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: It’s a big cover get the smaller size most likely
customer_reviews.text: Grown Man Cover no doubt 💪🏼💪🏼 I should of got the smaller size w my Jetta Tsi Vw.. But I’ll have this a LOOONG Time, I cover fast by myself good deal too I think..
customer_reviews.author: Dizzle

customer_reviews.title: Needs more ways to secure
customer_reviews.text: Wish there was more than just the three holes to at the side one at the front to secure it because we have been having the problem of the cover blowing off
customer_reviews.author: Melody E.

customer_reviews.title: Not the same material that's in the product photos, but fits
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and an area in the fabric looks like it was not properly seamed. It's not an intentional "air hole" since the other side doesn't have it, nor is it anywhere else on the cover. The material is also not the same that's in the product photos. The product photo material looks like much higher quality than what was received. Compare my pics with theirs and you can tell. Otherwise the cover fits well and I'll see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durability, long lasting protection against the elements
customer_reviews.text: So far ..so good. It's fairly new, so time will be the test. It's a bit too big, but the smaller size would've been too short.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Towell

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof, leaking, very heavy cover
customer_reviews.text: Cover is leaking from the stitches on the first time i used it. Also it’s very heavy cover need 2 person to put it and remove it. Not easy folded, take too much space After folded Attracted alot of dirt on the cotton side. If it was waterproof like advertised i would ignore the rest of the cons but all of the cons and still water leakege? At least it looks good on the car. 2 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is all it says it is and more love it!👍😁
customer_reviews.text: Love this finally one cover that will keep the dust out and off the car! The rain cannot make it wet nor snow wish I knew about this along time ago wouldn’t have had to buy so many!
customer_reviews.author: Candy Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect and water tight. I did however notice a oily sheen on windshield after using it but may not be fault of cover just thought I would mention it. Way big for 2001 BMW Z3.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 1997 911 fairly well and is a great value. Highl recommend this cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is an inexpensive and waterproof solution for outdoor car protection. Fits my 1997 911 fairly well and is a great value. Highl recommend this cover.
customer_reviews.author: samuel h shamansky

customer_reviews.title: Great reliable, “water resistant” car cover.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding car cover. Fit perfect on ‘15 Camaro. Is water resistant; however, not water proof. Worth the money, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great car cover
customer_reviews.text: This is the best car cover. Used on my Honda Odyssey van in California. Protects against wind and blowing sand as well as water. Highly recommend! Had bought one for another vehicle and just bought another for our Honda.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy J

customer_reviews.title: Great car cover No water penetrates through
customer_reviews.text: Great car cover No water penetrates through. When removing it the car looks like I just washed it. I just bought it so I don't have a time factor to judge its durability yet.
customer_reviews.author: Vicenta Dorsey

product_meta.title: OxGord Executive Storm-Proof Car Cover - Water Resistant 7 Layers -Developed for Any All Conditions - Ready-Fit Semi Glove Fit - Fits up to 200" Inches
product_meta.description: Size:XL - Fits up to 204"OxGord Ready-Fit covers are called Semi Glove Fit since they are designed to provide a very good fit using incremental sizing You ll find Ready-Fit covers readily available at most automotive retailers, in up to 7 different levels of protection Our wide variety of patterns provides a good Semi Glove Fit
feature_bullets: DIMENSIONS: Fits up to 204 Inches - XL / Extra Large Cover Size 17.06" L x 4.59" W x 4.43" H
MADE OF: Water Resistant 5 Layers - 3 Layers of Spunbond Polypropylene + 1 Layer of Micro-Porous Film + 1 Layer of Soft Fleece
FEATURES: Reinforced Seams - Superior Breathability - Front and Rear Elastic Hems & Draw Strings - To Ensure a Snug Semi Glove Fit
INCLUDES: Storage Bag and Antenna Patch - Tie Down Security Grommets for Helps Prevent Theft & High Winds.
Made by a trusted company OxGord

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars1,023 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
